children.comment: You must  give  a protein  sequence file  in fasta format.
children.name: protein

children.comment: You must give an HMMER file.
children.name: hmmer

format.python: ( "" , " " + str(value) )[ value is not None and value != vdef]

children.name: tabs
children.prompt: Report positions as absolute to truncated/reverse sequence (-tabs)

format.python: ( "" , " -g " + str(value) )[ value is not None and value != vdef]
( "" , " -e " + str(value) )[ value is not None and value != vdef]
( "" , " -m" + str(value) )[ value is not None and value != vdef]

( "" , " -indel " + str(value) )[ value is not None and value != vdef]
( "" , " -null " + str(value) )[ value is not None and value != vdef]

children.name: null
children.prompt: Random Model as synchronous or flat (-null)

format.python: ( "" , " -alln " + str(value) )[ value is not None and value != vdef]

children.name: alln
children.prompt: Probability of matching a NNN codon (-alln)

format.python: ( "" , " -gene " + str(value) )[ value is not None and value != vdef]
( "" , " -cfreq " + str(value) )[ value is not None and value != vdef]

children.name: block
children.prompt: Length of main block in pretty output (-block)

children.name: pseudo
children.prompt: Mark genes with frameshifts as pseudogenes (-pseudo)

children.name: genesf
children.prompt: Show gene structure with supporting evidence (-genesf)

children.name: embl
children.prompt: Show EMBL feature format with CDS key (-embl)

children.name: diana
children.prompt: Show EMBL feature format with misc_feature key for diana (-diana)

children.name: trans
children.prompt: Show protein translation, breaking at frameshifts (-trans)

format.python: ( "" , " -splice_max_collar " + str(value) )[ value is not None and value != vdef]

children.name: splice_max_collar
children.prompt: Maximum Bits value for a splice site (-splice_max_collar)

format.python: ( "" , " -splice_min_collar " + str(value) )[ value is not None and value != vdef]

children.name: splice_min_collar
